website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a waterproof paging system for bathroom or shower safety, look no further.
pros: Rated IP55 waterproof and is acceptable for outdoor use
Receivers plug into an electrical outlet
1,000-foot remote control range, penetrating power and signal stability
Call units come with batteries installed
Adhere call units to surface with double-sided adhesive or included screws

customer_reviews.title: Great product as long as you’re not in a hurry for it!
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is working awesome! My disabled husband uses this to call for assistance when he needs it. I put one on his nightstand and one on the bathroom vanity. I attached them with the double side tape to secure them. I have moved the plug in receiver to the garage when doing chores. No problems. The biggest problem was the length of time it took to receive them. I didn’t realize until after ordering that they were shipped from China. Great product as long as you’re not in a hurry for it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J

customer_reviews.title: invaluable to caregiver and patient
customer_reviews.text: My husband has difficulty rising from chairs, etc. I can quickly assist when he rings. He has also fallen several times, and I feel comfortable when he is out of sight because I know he will ring me for assistance. The unit range is more than adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Loud and and audible for a nice cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for listening out for my grandma when she needs help. I've yet to miss her calling for help, I hear it through my earphones and headphones even my closed back headphones. Very decent for the price. Plug it into the wall and press the button batteries are included.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron sev

customer_reviews.title: Works well, big selections of tunes, easy to distinguish from other noises
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, works well. Two buttons allows one to be at bedside, the other in walker or wheelchair. Have had no problems with it at all. Lots of different tunes to choose from (so it won't get mistaken for the doorbell). This lets the caregiver choose something they don't find irritating. Tune lasts long enough so that there is no question of whether or not it went off, even if doing something noisy like laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Very simple installation.
customer_reviews.text: We use it from our basement, at the foot of the stairs, to let me know that my wife has arrived home with packages and needs me to help her bring them up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: ernieo1

customer_reviews.title: Very soft tone
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t use this because bell tone too soft. It was placed only a room away and even at night the volume wouldn’t go high enough to hear. Had to be sitting very close by to hear it, so I bought another type and it is loud which we need.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R

customer_reviews.title: One button not working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased recently. Easy to set up and use, but after a week or two, one of the buttons does not work. Is it possible to get a replacement button?
customer_reviews.author: Moshe

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was louder because I use it to hear my elderly mom but it would probably be fine for someone who don't have to wear hearing aids though. Easy to use but couldn't get it to stay on a different sound though kinda disappointed in that part.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The equipment works really well. I was disappointed when I received incorrect information about a second set ringing on the same receiver. The frequency is not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Aubra Palmer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use at my office. It was easy to set different rings to the devices. Also the volume is good for us, not too loud. I had previously tried one that was too loud and difficult to program.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for doorbell and to call caregiver for help!
customer_reviews.text: Came with two push buttons! One is to replace our doorbell! The other is beside my chair for caregiver assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Powell

customer_reviews.title: Installs in 2 seconds and does the job well, even on a fairly long distance
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to install, many choices of sounds, choices of sound level/ perfect
customer_reviews.author: M.D.

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My father is handicapped and has fallen numerous times trying to walk without assistance. I place one call button by his chair and the other in the bedroom. Now when he needs something he just rings me in the basement and he does not have to try to get up alone. I love them
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my elderly parents to call me ftom their room when they need me!
customer_reviews.author: Sparkleyz

customer_reviews.title: Works great and save me from yelling!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I use it to signal my grand when he acts like he can’t hear me. It saves me from yelling through the house for him. Works Great and saves me from stressing.
customer_reviews.author: DeRayii

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Use product so i would know if my mom neefs help in bathroom and at night.it works great. Mom can also carry outside when she is taking walk or working in flower beds
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to move and install just plug in any outlet
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is the choice of rings. Very pleased though.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L. Keller

customer_reviews.title: Works well as call system.
customer_reviews.text: Works well as call system. Just wish it were easier to set the tone.
customer_reviews.author: K. Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Keep up with device
customer_reviews.text: Needs a cord for neck or wrist. My wife uses it but constantly leaves it The device works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect specifications
customer_reviews.text: Says works up to 1000ft but does not work even 100ft
customer_reviews.author: S. G. J. Senewiratne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: My son came home from the hospital and sometimes during the night I would need an extra pair of hands to care for him and couldn't leave him alone in the room to go wake up my husband. This was the perfect solution. The remote worked all the way across our home and was loud enough to wake up my husband, which says a lot because he is a heavy sleeper. You can turn the volume down though if you don't want it for the purpose of waking someone up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Easy Setup and good volume
customer_reviews.text: Very simple setup. Nice and loud enough to hear in a 2 story home.
customer_reviews.author: TMShopSmart

product_meta.title: Waterproof Caregiver, Penck Smart Nurse Call System 2 SOS Call Buttons Wireless Cordless Bell with 2 Remote, 500Ft Range, 52 Melodies, 4 Volume Levels, 1 Plug-in Receiver, LED Flash
product_meta.description:
Features:
Push button remote rating of Waterproof: IP55
Battery included: A23 12V Alkaline battery
Operating Range: Up to 1000ft in THE open air
Volume Ajustable Range:25~110 dB,4 levels

Something you should know before installation
1.Test the operating range you desire before installation.choose outlet to plug in receiver and take transmitter outside door;
2.trigger it to test if it can work well within the range you choose.

Pairing and Change Ring Tone
Push button is freely match with receiver and vice versa.
a) Select desired ring tone by pressing Music Control Button;
b) Set Receiver into pairing mode by pressing the Volume Control Button on the receiver for about 5-7 seconds until LED flashes to get entered into "pairing" state;
c) Next, quickly initiate or set the pairing process by pressing the transmitter button to pair with receiver.
You will hear the tune you selected, which means that your operation is completed successfully.

Package Included
1 * Receiver
2 * IP55 Waterproof Transmitters
2 * A23 12V Alkaline Battery for Push Button(Included)
4 * Screws; 4 * anchors
2 * Double-Sided Adhesive Tape.
1 * User Manual
feature_bullets: Our product is according to the rules of the frequencies using; It won't produce harmful electromagnetic interference

The door button can also be used as a portable paging system. Wireless doorbells for home, hospital, office building, hotel, residential quarters, family even the urgent call button for the older, or pregnant women, music alarm for children

Remote transmitter push button is rated IP55 waterproof and acceptable for outdoor use. Easily plug receivers into an electrical outlet (no batteries required for main receiver). CE, FCC, RoHS certified
Up to 1000 feet (300 meters) super remote control range in Open Air and penetrating power, signal stability. 52 polyphonic ring tones for optional and 4 level adjustable indoor ring volume

Easy Installation: NO more complex installation instructions- NO special tools needed to install our wireless plug-in doorbell! Just plug the receiver into an electrical outlet, insert the INCLUDED Battery (12V 23A) and mount the push-button base on the door frame with DOUBLE-SIDED ADHESIVE TAPE or the SCREWS INCLUDED in our kit!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
